description: Returns the number of blocks in the longest blockchain.
Returns the information about the tip header of the longest.

types.verbosity: 1 for a json object, 0 for hex encoded [Header](../util/types/schemas/blockchain.mol#L84) data, an optional parameter, default is 1

description: Returns the information about the current epoch.
Return the information corresponding the given epoch number.
Returns the hash of a block in the best-block-chain by block number; block of No.0 is the genesis block.
Returns the information about a block by hash.

types.verbosity: 2 for a json object, 0 for hex encoded [Block](../util/types/schemas/blockchain.mol#L94) data, an optional parameter, default is 2

description: Returns the information about a block header by hash.

types.verbosity: 1 for a json object, 0 for hex encoded [Header](../util/types/schemas/blockchain.mol#L84) data, an optional parameter, default is 1

description: Returns the information about a block header by block number.

types.verbosity: 1 for a json object, 0 for hex encoded [Header](../util/types/schemas/blockchain.mol#L84) data, an optional parameter, default is 1

deprecated: This method is deprecated since version 0.36.0 for reasons of flexibility, please use [ckb-indexer](https://github.com/nervosnetwork/ckb-indexer) as an alternate solution
description: Returns the information about live cells collection by the hash of lock script.
Returns the information about a cell by out_point if it is live. If second with_data argument set to true, will return cell data and data_hash if it is live
Returns the local node information.

returns.addresses: The addresses of node listen to

description: Returns the connected peers information.

returns.sync_state::best_known_header_hash: Best known header hash of remote peer

returns.sync_state::best_known_header_number: Best known header number of remote peer

returns.sync_state::last_common_header_hash: Last common header hash of remote peer

returns.sync_state::last_common_header_number: Last common header number of remote peer

returns.sync_state::unknown_header_list_size: The total size of unknown header list

returns.sync_state::inflight_count: The count of concurrency downloading blocks

returns.sync_state::can_fetch_count: The count of blocks are available for concurrency download

description: Returns all banned IPs/Subnets.
Insert or delete an IP/Subnet from the banned list

types.address: The IP/Subnet with an optional netmask (default is /32 = single IP)

types.command: `insert` to insert an IP/Subnet to the list, `delete` to delete an IP/Subnet from the list

types.ban_time: Time in milliseconds how long (or until when if [absolute] is set) the IP is banned, optional parameter, null means using the default time of 24h

types.absolute: If set, the `ban_time` must be an absolute timestamp in milliseconds since epoch, optional parameter

description: Returns sync state of this node

returns.best_known_block_number: Height of the most difficult header observed across the network

returns.best_known_block_timestamp: Timestamp of the most difficult header observed across the network

returns.ibd: Whether the node is in IBD status, i.e. whether the local data is within one day of the latest

returns.inflight_blocks_count: Number of blocks being requested for download

returns.orphan_blocks_count: Number of blocks that have been downloaded but can't find the corresponding parents yet

returns.fast_time: The download scheduler's time analysis data, the fast is the 1/3 of the cut-off point, unit ms

returns.normal_time: The download scheduler's time analysis data, the normal is the 4/5 of the cut-off point, unit ms

returns.low_time: The download scheduler's time analysis data, the low is the 9/10 of the cut-off point, unit ms

description: Disable/enable all p2p network activity

types.state: true to enable networking, false to disable

description: Attempts to add a node to the peers list and try connecting to it.
Attempts to remove a node from the peers list and try disconnecting from it.
Requests that a ping be sent to all connected peers, to measure ping time. Results provided in get_peers rpc last_ping_duration field is milliseconds.
Return state info of blockchain
Deprecating in 0.12.0: Return state info of peers

Dry run transaction and return the execution cycles.

This method will not check the transaction validity, but only run the lock script
and type script and then return the execution cycles.
Used to debug transaction scripts and query how many cycles the scripts consume

Return the transaction hash

**Deprecated**: will be removed in a later version
Calculate the maximum withdraw one can get, given a referenced DAO cell, and a withdraw block hash

Estimate a fee rate (capacity/KB) for a transaction that to be committed in expect blocks.

This method estimate fee rate by sample transactions that collected from p2p network
expected_confirm_blocks must be between 3 and 1000
an error will return if samples is not enough
Send new transaction into transaction pool.

types.outputs_validator: Validates the transaction outputs before entering the tx-pool, an optional string parameter (enum: default | passthrough ), null means passthrough. The deafult validator requires each output use the standard lock and type scripts, passthrough means skipping the validation.

description: Returns the information about a transaction requested by transaction hash.
Returns each component of the created CKB in this block's cellbase, which is issued to a block N - 1 - ProposalWindow.farthest, where this block's height is N.
Returns increased issuance, miner reward and total transaction fee of a block.

returns.finalized_at: The hash of the block which finalized

returns.txs_fee: The total transaction fee of all transactions in the this block

description: Return the transaction pool information
Remove all transactions from the tx-pool
Get block by number

types.verbosity: 2 for a json object, 0 for hex encoded [Block](../util/types/schemas/blockchain.mol#L94) data, an optional parameter, default is 2

description: Create index for live cells and transactions by the hash of lock script.

types.index_from: Create an index from starting block number (exclusive), an optional parameter, null means starting from tip and 0 means starting from genesis

returns.created_by: Refer to the transaction which creates this cell output

types.reverse_order: Returns the live cells collection in reverse order, an optional parameter, default is false

description: Returns the transactions collection by the hash of lock script. Returns empty array when the `lock_hash` has not been indexed yet.

types.reverse_order: Return the transactions collection in reverse order, an optional parameter, default is false

returns.block_number: At which block capacity was calculated

types.args: Hex encoded arguments passed to reference cell

types.hash_type: data: code_hash matches against dep cell data hash; type: code_hash matches against dep cell type hash.

description: Returns data needed to construct a block to work on

types.bytes_limit: optional number, specify the max bytes of block

types.proposals_limit: optional number, specify the max proposals of block

types.max_version: optional number, specify the max block version

description: Submit new block to network

Subscribe to a topic, if successful it returns the subscription id. For each event that matches the subscription a notification with relevant data (JSON-formatted string) is send together with the subscription id. Example: {"jsonrpc":"2.0","method":"subscribe","params":{"result":"...block header JSON-formatted string...","subscription":"0x2a"}}
unsubscribe from a subscribed topic
